divs: Sighting DetailsWALKING HOME DOWN WOBURN ST FROM LATE NIGHT MOVIE SPOTTED WITH A FEMALE FRIEND SUDDENLY A SPHEREICAL OBJECT WITH LIGHTS ROTATING?? BLINKING?? TOTALLY SILENT ABOUT 100-200 FEET ALMOST DIRECTLY ABOVE US ----LOOKED AT ONE ANOTHER SAID "WHAT IS THAT" WATCHED FOR 1-3 MIN AND AS SUDDENLY AS IT HAD APPEARED IT DISAPPEARED IN A FLASH ,SILENTLY---THOUGHTS :DISBELIEF, NOT AT ALL SCARED ,AMAZEMENT -- WONDERED IF ANYONE ELSE SAW IT --- NOTHING IN PAPER NEXT DAY --CONTACTED NO ONE AND UNTIL RECENTLY HAVE NEVER DISCUSSED IT AGAIN OR TOLD ANYONE OTHER THAN ONE OR TWO PEOPLE.PROMPTED TO REPORT AFTER RECENT SIGHTINGS IN TEXAS ---NOT AT ALL SURE ABOUT YEAR SEEN??
Summary: SAW A UFO LATE NIGHT WITH FEMALE,NURSE FRIEND
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Boston
There were no other sightings in Boston on or around May 31st 1983
